briefdescription.para: Variable to store the current page number.
Function to handle the main page UI. This function is called when the current page is set to MAIN.

detaileddescription.para:
This function should contain the logic to update the main page of the Nextion display. It may include updating text fields, images, and other UI elements specific to the main page. This function does not return any value.
this function is part of the ui_task and is called when the task is running and the current page is set to MAIN.
ui_task
Ernesto Estrada
June 6, 2025
1.0
Ensure that the Nextion display is initialized before calling this function.
This function should not be called directly, it is called by the ui_task.

briefdescription.para: Function to handle the case when no page is set. This function is called when the current page is set to NO_PAGE.

detaileddescription.para:
This function should contain the logic to handle the case when no specific page is set in the Nextion display. It may include clearing the display or showing a default message. This function does not return any value.
this function is part of the ui_task and is called when the task is running and the current page is set to NO_PAGE.
ui_task
